definition[0]: an insect with a round hard back that is usually black
definition[1]: to go somewhere quickly and leaning forward
example[0]: He went beetling off down the corridor.
definition[2]: a small car made by Volkswagen which has a high, rounded top. It was first produced in the 1930s and has been popular ever since because of its unusual shape. In 1998 a Beetle with a completely new design went on sale.
